snippet: Max von Sydow discusses his role in the film "Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close" and of taking on a nonspeaking part when he can speak several languages.
abstract: Max von Sydow discusses his role in the film "Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close" and of taking on a nonspeaking part when he can speak several languages.
lead_paragraph: The tea leaves are not exactly auspicious for "Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close." Stephen Daldry's star-studded adaptation of Jonathan Safran Foer's post-Sept. 11 story has drawn little prize attention thus far, though the generous folks at the Palm Springs International Film Festival did honor it.

headline.main: Max von Sydow on Not Speaking (and That Chess Game)
